eecs.sim
Interface RouletteData

All Known Implementing Classes:
RouletteGui, RouletteWheel
public interface RouletteData

RouletteData does not contain any methods. It is solely a "container" for any required information about a game of roulette, such as the colors of the wheel and the values.
